name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Dedicated Senior Support Engineer with 13+ years of experience enhancing customer experience through exceptional technical support and problem-solving capabilities. Proficient in tools like **Zendesk**, **Linear**, **JIRA**, and **Sendgrid**, adept at leveraging **SaaS** solutions to troubleshoot and resolve client issues effectively. Strong analytical skills with experience in leveraging **SQL** and **metabase** for data-driven decision-making and reporting.

Possesses a robust background as a Full Stack Developer, with hands-on expertise in JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, and **Flutter**. Experience in both frontend and backend development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Skilled in developing AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and real-time processing, supported by deployment of robust cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**. Well-versed in compliance, aligning solutions with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, coupled with a strong understanding of MLOps tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
